Ovilla Municipal Development District (MDD)
-------------------------------------------

A Municipal Development District is a special purpose district created for the purpose of generating economic development and growth opportunities within the boundaries of the district.

[MDD](https://www.cityofovilla.org/123/Municipal-Development-District-MDD)

Serving on a Board or Commission is a great way to become involved in Ovilla. All Board and Commission appointments are made by the City Council. If you are interested in serving on a Board or Commission, please fill out the application form and return to the City Secretary.

[Boards or Commissions Application](https://www.cityofovilla.org/DocumentCenter/View/624 "Board or Commission Application ")

[Fillable Board and Commission Application](https://www.cityofovilla.org/DocumentCenter/View/3633)
